pullrequest.title: Fix gzsdf to not segfault when converting bad files

content.raw:
Seems like it should be possible to do away with the `success` flag, and instead just `return` non-zero in all error conditions in `main()`.  If control reaches the end of the function, it was a success.

But that's a minor point; I don't feel strongly about it.
content.html:
Seems like it should be possible to do away with the success flag, and instead just return non-zero in all error conditions in main(). If control reaches the end of the function, it was a success.

But that's a minor point; I don't feel strongly about it.
